reviewText: This is a well designed yoga DVD by Aaron Star!  It's a complete yoga practice for many purposes.  I recommend it!

a wonderful set that focuses on the beneifts of yoga for the beginner or the accomplished alike. a very powerful spiritual and physical experience that i highly reccomend and the ye candy aint bad either!

There is alot of Instructional Teaching by Aaron,plus he aint shy in touching the men up in his sensual way. The only disappointment was that the dvd disc( packaging was damaged in ternal) the discs are ok and beware boys tend to get excited every now and then ,,close up snaps are HOT

The 8 DVD-Box is a selection of nicely made Yoga-DVDs with cute young men. I practise yoga for one year now and found it easy to join and follow the DVD-classes. The instructions are clearly given and the students are corrected if they made mistakes. So you always know on what you should pay attention. The 8 DVDs offer a good variety of content so you always have a class fitting your every day mood whether it should be relaxing or demanding concentrating on workout. I bought the nude DVDs series to have an extra motivation watching the athletic guys while I'm practising my yoga. I have fun doing my home yoga with this series and really can recommend it.

I would like to recommend this dvd set to all gay or straight men who wants to find out there true identity through yoga. In wonderful places, such you can only find in Hawaii, there are nice and beautiful men doing yoga nude. No, it's not sex, it's real, it's very serious, and all the men are very much involved doing the asanas (postures) with much concentration. Being nude helps men of all ages to really get together in wonderful moments of pure sensuality and pleasure. I've been to Aaron's HNY retreats in London or in Paris and may I tell you that those moments are unforgettable!
These discs are a great way to practice at home inbetween going to class.  A great way also to remember a magical week in Hawaii.
